and Computers DNS DHCP and WINS etc I was responsible for creating security groups service accounts and privileged accounts 1accounts in AD Created 200 DFS shares on file servers and provisioned type description of the servers Worked on the ShavlikBig fix patching tool to add servers in to the monthly patching schedules and install the windows updates Worked on AD Cleans up project to delete
